articles.title: 10000 tonnes of uncollected trash in Paris as unions call for more action against pension reforms - Euronews
articles.description: Unions are calling for an escalation of industrial action next week which could see strikes hit planes, trains, port operations, oil refineries, electricity and gas supplies.
articles.content: There's an estimated 10,000 tonnes of uncollected trash piling up on the streets of the French capital, as unions call for more weekend protests and strike action against controversial pension reform… [+1833 chars]
